mapper.select: SELECT GroupTeam.id, GroupTeam.name, GroupTeam.task_id, GroupTeam.group_leader, GroupTeam.process, GroupTeam.file FROM ( SELECT task.team_size, g.* FROM v_group g JOIN task ON task.id = #{taskId} AND g.task_id = task.id LEFT JOIN in_group r ON r.group_id = g.id group by g.id having count(r.id) < task.team_size ) as GroupTeam
